md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 8 Episode 7 The Legend of Black Jake
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: A pair of bumbling crooks kidnaps Nels and holds him for ransom.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: A pair of bumbling crooks kidnaps Nels and holds him for ransom. However, Mrs. Olesen refuses to pay the $100 fee required to free her husband, so Nels decides to work with the crooks to get his revenge. In the process, nearly everyone in Walnut Grove finds themselves on the wrong side of the criminals.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: A pair of bumbling crooks kidnaps Nels and holds him for ransom. However, Mrs. Olesen refuses to pay the $100 fee required to free her husband, so Nels decides to work with the crooks to get his revenge. In the process, nearly everyone in Walnut Grove finds themselves on the wrong side of the criminals.
